content:
bridge The Gap Chamber Players a nonprofit organization made up of current SMU students and SMU graduates play free events around the Dallas area PERIOD On April  Bridge the Gap had an event at the HughesTrigg Student Center including a brass group a string quartet and free cookies PERIOD Two other groups Deep Ellum Brass and Altius Quartet each played a halfhour set for students and passersby to listen to PERIOD While some pieces were classic others were renditions of popular culture songs PERIOD From left to right Lauren Ewing Ray Henninger  Chris Guilfoyle Tom Neal and Peter Stammer played a half hour set for an audience in the HughesTrigg Student Center PERIOD Photo credit Danielle Deraleau



The Independent Voice of Southern Methodist University Since
